People...

First off who cares about a 2CD file size--with most movies of this length it is normal (looks shitty when compressed to one disc). Who cares that there aren't thousands of seeders--some people get tired of having the same files around all the time. And many simply leech.

This is a great movie, an awesome rip (though outside of torrents you have to watch those aXXo filenames--most are fake) and it works fine on this end. If it didn't, there would be very few seeds. Audio problems? Switch out your codecs and for F's sake put VLC to rest. K-Lite Codec Pack and Media Player Classic is the winning combo for any kind of rip. ANY.

Kudos to aXXo.
